long_description: Great to wear as liners under thick socks for next-to-skin comfort or alone in warm weather, the WrightSock SLT (superlight) crew socks keep your feet comfortable from trailhead to summit. CoolMax(R) polyester wicks moisture away from skin to keep your feet dry and blister-free; nylon adds stretch and provides a snug fit that retains its shape. Closeout.
short_description: Great to wear as liners under thick socks for next-to-skin comfort or alone in warm weather, the WrightSock SLT (superlight) crew socks keep your feet comfortable from trailhead to summit.
